ids_info.name: pellets
ids_info.description: Description of pellets launched into the plasma

pellets/time_slice.documentation: Description of the pellets launched at various time slices. The time of this structure corresponds to the full ablation of the pellet inside the plasma. Within pellets IDS: Description of pellets launched into the plasma.

pellets/time_slice/pellet.documentation: Set of pellets ablated in the plasma at a given time. Within pellets IDS: Description of pellets launched into the plasma. Within time_slice container: Description of the pellets launched at various time slices. The time of this structure corresponds to the full ablation of the pellet inside the plasma.

pellets/time_slice/pellet/shape.documentation: Initial shape of a pellet at launch. Within pellets IDS: Description of pellets launched into the plasma. Within time_slice container: Description of the pellets launched at various time slices. The time of this structure corresponds to the full ablation of the pellet inside the plasma. Within pellet container: Set of pellets ablated in the plasma at a given time.

pellets/time_slice/pellet/shape/type.documentation: Identifier structure for the shape type: 1-spherical; 2-cylindrical; 3-rectangular. Within pellets IDS: Description of pellets launched into the plasma. Within time_slice container: Description of the pellets launched at various time slices. The time of this structure corresponds to the full ablation of the pellet inside the plasma. Within pellet container: Set of pellets ablated in the plasma at a given time. Within shape container: Initial shape of a pellet at launch.

Within pellet container: Set of pellets ablated in the plasma at a given time. Within shape container: Initial shape of a pellet at launch. Within type container: Identifier structure for the shape type: 1-spherical; 2-cylindrical; 3-rectangular.

pellets/time_slice/pellet/shape/type/ind.documentation: Integer identifier (enumeration index within a list). Private identifier values must be indicated by a negative index. Within pellets IDS: Description of pellets launched into the plasma. Within time_slice container: Description of the pellets launched at various time slices. The time of this structure corresponds to the full ablation of the pellet inside the plasma. Within pellet container: Set of pellets ablated in the plasma at a given time. Within shape container: Initial shape of a pellet at launch. Within type container: Identifier structure for the shape type: 1-spherical; 2-cylindrical; 3-rectangular.

pellets/time_slice/pellet/shape/type/des.documentation: Verbose description. Within pellets IDS: Description of pellets launched into the plasma. Within time_slice container: Description of the pellets launched at various time slices. The time of this structure corresponds to the full ablation of the pellet inside the plasma. Within pellet container: Set of pellets ablated in the plasma at a given time. Within shape container: Initial shape of a pellet at launch. Within type container: Identifier structure for the shape type: 1-spherical; 2-cylindrical; 3-rectangular.

pellets/time_slice/pellet/shape/size.documentation: Size of the pellet in the various dimensions, depending on the shape type. Spherical pellets: size(1) is the radius of the pellet. Cylindrical pellets: size(1) is the radius and size(2) is the height of the cylinder. Rectangular pellets: size(1) is the height, size(2) is the width and size(3) is the length. Within pellets IDS: Description of pellets launched into the plasma. Within time_slice container: Description of the pellets launched at various time slices. The time of this structure corresponds to the full ablation of the pellet inside the plasma. Within pellet container: Set of pellets ablated in the plasma at a given time. Within shape container: Initial shape of a pellet at launch.

Within pellet container: Set of pellets ablated in the plasma at a given time.

pellets/time_slice/time.documentation: Time. Within pellets IDS: Description of pellets launched into the plasma. Within time_slice container: Description of the pellets launched at various time slices. The time of this structure corresponds to the full ablation of the pellet inside the plasma.

pellets/latency.documentation: Upper bound of the delay between input command received from the RT network and actuator starting to react. Applies globally to the system described by this IDS unless specific latencies (e.g. channel-specific or antenna-specific) are provided at a deeper level in the IDS structure. Within pellets IDS: Description of pellets launched into the plasma.

pellets/time.documentation: Generic time. Within pellets IDS: Description of pellets launched into the plasma.
